abilities.name: Rear Sensor
abilities.effect: Each player's Active Basic Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex) can't use any Poké-Powers.

attacks.name: Foresight
attacks.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order you like.

attacks.name: Disorder
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has any Special Energy cards attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
